SEARCH

Class Gold

java.lang.Object
User
Customer
Gold
public class Gold extends Customer
Represents a Gold-level customer, extending the Customer class. This class includes additional information about the gold level of the customer. It provides constructors for creating Gold customers with different sets of information and getter and setter methods for accessing and modifying the gold level details.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mert Can Bilgin
